pkgmetadata.longdescription:
HakuNeko (Legacy) allows you to download manga images from some selected online manga reader websites.
Currently Supported:
* Batoto * DynastyScans * KissAnime * KissManga * MangaFox * Mangago * MangaHead * MangaHere * MangaHere (es) * MangaPanda * MangaReader

use.flag: Build with clang++ rather than g++
